ch.iserver.ace.collaboration
Interface RemoteDocument

All Known Subinterfaces:
MutableRemoteDocument
public interface RemoteDocument

The RemoteDocument interface provides methods applicable to remote documents that were discovered, most notable is the join method which allows to send a join request to the document.

Field Summary
static String TITLE_PROPERTY
          The name of the title property.
 
Method Summary
 void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
          Registers a PropertyChangeListener to receive property change events from this document.

          Gets the unique identifier of the document.
 RemoteUser getPublisher()
          Gets the RemoteUser object for the publisher of the document.
 String getTitle()
          Gets the title of the document.
 void join(JoinCallback callback)
          Joins this remote document.
 void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
          Removes a registered PropertyChangeListener from the list of registered listeners.
